scenario_text.value:
That voice...it’s definitely Minoru! But
where the heck is he?!

Noooo, stay away!
Why’d it have to be that thing again?!
Takuma! I can sense Gottsumon nearby!
That rock thing from before?! Where is it?
Ummm... Way over there, in that direction!

That’s near the inner shrine! Okay, let’s
hurry over there, Agumon!

Wait, Takuma! I sense a whole BUNCH of
Gottsumon over there this time!

What?! Dammit...even so, we can’t leave
Minoru to fend for himself! Let’s go!
Got it, Takuma! Leave it to me!
